algorithm_technique: Greedy approach with sorting and a max heap to maintain k smallest qualities
problem_summary_simple: Hire k workers such that their wages are proportional to quality and meet minimum wage expectations, minimizing total cost.
problem_summary_technical: Sort workers by wage-to-quality ratio. Iterate, maintaining k workers with smallest qualities in a max heap.
key_insights: The key insight is that the wage-to-quality ratio must be the same for all hired workers.
To minimize cost, we should pick the worker with the highest wage-to-quality ratio among the k workers.
A max heap is used to efficiently track the k workers with the smallest qualities encountered so far.
